title: ServiceFabric.PubSubActors.Interfaces
description: Used by ServiceFabric.PubSubActors, which adds pub/sub behaviour to your Reliable Actors in Service Fabric. Add this package to your Reliable Actor.Interfaces projects.
summary: Main Package 'ServiceFabric.PubSubActors' lets a 'Publisher Actor' publish messages to 'Subscriber Actors', without the need to know anything about those Subscriber Actors.
